SCENARIO 6: MBK - ACC / ACT / REP = 2 / 1 / 0 ; SHK / SIZ = Y / S

INPUTS

GROUP 1: Room Access

#Key IdRoom NameCharacter Name
11Room 1Peter
21Room 1Paul

GROUP 2: Room Action

#Key IdActionDone By
11EnterSteve

GROUP 3: Room Repair: Empty

OUTPUTS

GROUP 1: File room_action.log

#Line
11|Room 1|Steve|Enter

0 failed of 1: SUCCESS

GROUP 2: File room_repair.log: Empty as expected: SUCCESS

GROUP 3: Unhandled Exception: Empty as expected: SUCCESS

0 failed of 3: SUCCESS
